ygData.subject: Celeron
ygData.msgSnippet: Celeron opened his eyes and realised that he was barried upside-down in sand.  He would have tried to fly out, but all his flying abilities allowed him to do

X-Yahoo-Profile: titobeau

Celeron opened his eyes and realised that he was barried upside-down
in sand.  He would have tried to fly out, but all his flying abilities
allowed him to do is go up, which was pointing down in this case.

Opening up a communication line, he soon found that this sand was
blocking radio transmissions.  There must have been some sort of metal
in this sand.  So left with his final option, he was going to use his
arms and legs to slowly dig himself out of the sand.  He was unable to
tell how deep he was in the sand, but when he tried to move it
helped..... a little.  So he began to squirm in a way that he filled
in the space below him, and dug out the space above him.

Upon calculating the preasure on his armor, Celeron determined it
would take him at least 5 hours to get out to the surface. 
Fortunately he had recharged before he has gotten here, but he had no
memory of when or why he was here.

So, Celeron put on some good music and kept digging.

(To Be Continued)

OOC:  I haven't posted for like 6 months.  I was posting under the
email address rm2kmidi.  Sorry if that's confusing.   Ummm..... yeah, 
good to be back!
